attributes.action: Stop the 3,000 Home Expansion of Swindon into Wiltshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to stop the expansion of Swindon into Wiltshire.

If this expansion were to happen then Swindon, Cricklade and Purton would almost become one and there would be disputes on where Swindon ends and where Cricklade and Purton starts.

With so much more people Swindon will almost definitely come to a big stand still and the town will not be able to cope. Swindon town centre is too small for this expansion.

Wildlife would be ruined in the process.
